57a4('bum): bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon
57a5('bum): par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa
57a6('bum): yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad
57a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam
57a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
57b1('bum): pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing
57b2('bum): mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul
57b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
57b4('bum): par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
57b5('bum): par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
57b6('bum): stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
57b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing
57b8('bum): mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu
58a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par
58a2('bum): zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la
58a3('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
58a4('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ting nge 'dzin
58a5('bum): rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon
58a6('bum): par zhen/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad
58a7('bum): shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
58a8('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub
58b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
58b2('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i
58b3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
58b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
58b5('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson
58b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
58b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
58b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
59a1('bum): slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
59a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
59a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi
59a4('bum): dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
59a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong
59a6('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
59a7('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi stong pa nyid la
59a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
59b1('bum): slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de
59b2('bum): mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
59b3('bum): tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang
59b4('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
59b5('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
59b6('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
59b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
59b8('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
60a1('bum): chen po/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
60a2('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
60a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
60a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
60a5('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
60a6('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
60a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
60a8('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dor ba med pa stong pa
60b1('bum): nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
60b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag
60b3('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
60b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /
60b5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
60b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /
60b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
60b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
61a1('bum): shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
61a2('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /
61a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
61a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
61a5('bum): ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
61a6('bum): ngo / /sha ra ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang
61a7('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
61a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang
61b1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
61b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing / yang
61b3('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
61b4('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha
61b5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
61b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
61b7('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stobs
61b8('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
62a1('bum): pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i
62a2('bum): tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
62a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
62a4('bum): lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
62a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
62a6('bum): ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
62a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
62a8('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa
62b1('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
62b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
62b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
62b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing /
62b5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
62b6('bum): 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs
62b7('bum): shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
62b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
63a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
63a2('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes
63a3('bum): pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
63a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
63a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
63a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
63a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs
63a8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
63b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
63b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa
63b3('bum): ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par
63b4('bum): rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
63b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha
63b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
63b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
63b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
64a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
64a3('bum): po/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
64a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
64a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/
64a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi
64a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
64a8('bum): 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
64b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs
64b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
64b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong
64b4('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /
64b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug go/ // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri
64b6('bum): zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchis na/
64b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad ces 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
64b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad
65a1('bum): du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
65a2('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa
65a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig
65a4('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
65a5('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
65a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
65a7('bum): la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
65a8('bum): mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
65b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
65b2('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
65b3('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
65b4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci
65b5('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du
65b6('bum): 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
65b7('bum): ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i
65b8('bum): skyes bu 'di/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du
66a1('bum): 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
66a2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du
66a3('bum): 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
66a4('bum): mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /
66a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
66a6('bum): ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
66a7('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /
66a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
66b1('bum): ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
66b2('bum): par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /

66b4('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom

66b6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /
66b7('bum): ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de

67a1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri
67a2('bum): zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom

67a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
67a5('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi

67a7('bum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du

67b1('bum): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
67b2('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad
67b3('bum): du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes

68a1('bum): 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa

68a3('bum): thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
68a4('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

68a6('bum): zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
68a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ mngon par shes
68a8('bum): pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
68b1('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
68b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa

68b4('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/

68b7('bum): par rig pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
68b8('bum): la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ snying rje chen po la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
69a1('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa
69a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
69a3('bum): bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom
69a4('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /
69a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
69a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
69a7('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
69a8('bum): sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba yang gzhan
69b1('bum): la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
69b2('bum): yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
69b3('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /
69b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
69b5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
69b6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ sgra yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri yang
69b7('bum): gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
69b8('bum): yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
70a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
70a2('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
70a3('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
70a4('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /
70a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan
70a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
70a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

75b3('bum): ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan
75b4('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos
75b5('bum): so/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan
75b6('bum): 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang
75b7('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
75b8('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi
76a1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par
76a2('bum): shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyis rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu
76a3('bum): ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
76a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg
76a5('bum): pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
76a6('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid
76a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus
76a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
76b1('bum): ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan
76b2('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

76b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

76b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /bcom
76b7('bum): ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/
76b8('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams
77a1('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
77a2('bum): nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i

77a4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
77a5('bum): kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das skye
77a6('bum): mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags

77a8('bum): sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid
77b1('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan

77b3('bum): kyang rga shi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
77b4('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
77b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
77b6('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha
77b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam
77b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab
78a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /
78a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
78a3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong
78a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
78a5('bum): ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid
78a6('bum): do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das
78a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa
78a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med
78b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das dor
78b2('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
78b3('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
78b4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
78b5('bum): ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
78b6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med stong
78b7('bum): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo
78b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med
79a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye
79a2('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /
79a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das dbang
79a4('bum): po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
79a5('bum): lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/
79a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid
79a7('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid
79a8('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan
79b1('bum): rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs med
79b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
79b3('bum): rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das
79b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i
79b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
79b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams
79b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
79b8('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid
80a1('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
80a2('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
80a3('bum): nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so
80a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom
80a5('bum): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
80a6('bum): so/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ /sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /
80a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /
80a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dgra
80b1('bum): bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma
80b2('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
80b3('bum): te lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
80b4('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom
80b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
80b6('bum): du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
80b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
80b8('bum): dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda' dang / gdags pa dang /
81a1('bum): tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur
81a2('bum): ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing / brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du
81a3('bum): gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
81a4('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/
81a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul
81a6('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha
81a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
81a8('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
81b1('bum): phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar phung po lnga po
81b2('bum): rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung

81b8('bum): de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag
82a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar mig

84b7('bum): 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grangs/ bcom ldan 'das
84b8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/
85a1('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jig shing dngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
85a2('bum): bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85a3('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar
85a4('bum): rtog te/ de mi dmigs so/ /'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog te/ de mi dmigs so/ /'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /

85a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /'du shes sdug
85a7('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog te/ de mi dmigs so/ /'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang
85a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog te/ de mi dmigs so/ /'du
