85b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
85b7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba stong zhes
85b8('bum): bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
86a1('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/
86a2('bum): de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a3('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
86a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar
86a5('bum): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
86a6('bum): sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
86a7('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
86a8('bum): sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de
86b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
86b2('bum): pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar
86b3('bum): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
86b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
86b5('bum): bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam
86b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
86b7('bum): kyis/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
86b8('bum): ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor
87a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs
87a2('bum): dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de
87a4('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
87a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
87a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor
87a7('bum): ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /
87a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
87b1('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /
87b2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
87b3('bum): rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
87b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
87b5('bum): rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di
87b6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
87b8('bum): yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/
88a1('bum): de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
88a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
88a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
88a4('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad
88a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
88a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /
88a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
88a8('bum): stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs
88b1('bum): so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
88b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'i
88b3('bum): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor
88b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma
88b5('bum): med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi
88b6('bum): dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad
88b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
88b8('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
89a1('bum): mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
89a2('bum): la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par
89a3('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad
89a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
89a5('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a6('bum): spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
89a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba
89b1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par
89b2('bum): rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs
89b3('bum): so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang
89b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
89b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
89b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
89b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par
89b8('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// //
90a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya
90a2('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya bar
90a3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs smon pa med ces bya
90a4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mi
90a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba zhi zhes
90a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba smon pa med ces bya
90a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mi rtag
90a8('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes zhi zhes
90b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes smon pa med
90b2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du
90b3('bum): byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /
90b4('bum): 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed
90b5('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /
90b6('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
90b7('bum): gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de
90b8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /
91a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems
91a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya
91a3('bum): ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de
91a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs
91a5('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid
91a6('bum): la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ /gzugs gang mtshan med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos
91a7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang
91a8('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
91b1('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
91b2('bum): pas/ tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs
91b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
91b4('bum): dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
91b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang
91b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba
91b7('bum): gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
91b8('bum): gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
92a1('bum): dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la
92a2('bum): byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs
92a3('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon pa med
92a4('bum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
92a5('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
92a6('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang sdug bsngal
92a7('bum): ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
92a8('bum): la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
92b1('bum): 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
92b2('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la
92b3('bum): bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dben
92b4('bum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
92b5('bum): la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya
92b6('bum): ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam
92b7('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /
92b8('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
93a1('bum): pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du
93a2('bum): bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
93a3('bum): gyis yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag
93a4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam
93a5('bum): pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang /
93a6('bum): mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
93a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
93a8('bum): rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
93b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad
93b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
93b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
93b4('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
93b5('bum): rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug
93b6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams
93b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
93b8('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
94a1('bum): yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
94a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
94a3('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
94a4('bum): rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
94a5('bum): bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa
94a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med
94a7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa
94a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
94b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
94b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
94b3('bum): go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed
94b4('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa
94b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed
94b6('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa
94b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par
94b8('bum): shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam
95a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
95a2('bum): par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
95a3('bum): rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
95a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ /de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor
95a5('bum): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
95a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
95a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
95a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
95b1('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
95b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
95b3('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
95b4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
95b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
95b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
95b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
95b8('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
96a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
96a2('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
96a3('bum): bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
96a4('bum): ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben
96a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
96a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog
96a7('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
96a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
96b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam
96b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
96b3('bum): chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
96b4('bum): bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed
96b5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
96b6('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang /
96b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
97a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
97a2('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
97a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su

97a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
97a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
97a7('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

100a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
100a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs
100b1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du shes

100b3('bum): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid
100b4('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ /rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong

100b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ dri'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang
100b8('bum): stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg gi stong pa nyid kyis/ reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ /reg nyid kyang stong pa
101a1('bum): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig
101a2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
101a3('bum): ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa

101a7('bum): shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te
101a8('bum): reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
101b1('bum): ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
101b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te
101b3('bum): reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ myig gi 'dus
101b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa
101b5('bum): nyid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
101b6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i
101b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus
101b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid
102a1('bum): do/ /stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi
102a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa
102a3('bum): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
102a4('bum): mye'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mye'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
102a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i
102a6('bum): khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ma rig pa stong pa
102a7('bum): ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong
102a8('bum): pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mying dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ mying dang
102b1('bum): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis/ skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /
102b2('bum): reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang
102b3('bum): tshor ba'o/ /sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong
102b4('bum): pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong
102b5('bum): pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
102b6('bum): tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa
102b7('bum): ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
102b8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson
103a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
103a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi
103a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid
103a4('bum): do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
103a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong
103a6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam
103a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
103a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma
103b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog
103b2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa
103b3('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong
103b4('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
103b5('bum): nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong
103b6('bum): pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
103b7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong
103b8('bum): pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dngos
104a1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
104a2('bum): so/ /yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rdzu 'phrul
104a3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
104a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan
104a5('bum): lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
104a6('bum): brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
104a7('bum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid
104a8('bum): do/ /stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshad myed pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i
104b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa
104b2('bum): brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar kyis
104b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
104b4('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
104b5('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes
104b6('bum): pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /
104b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin
104b8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ myi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa
105a1('bum): ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag
105a2('bum): par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang snying rje
105a3('bum): chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
105a4('bum): 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
105a5('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa'i de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //
105a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
105a7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
105a8('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
105b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
105b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du
105b3('bum): shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
105b4('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
105b5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
105b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
105b7('bum): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
106a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba sdug
106a2('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
106a3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
106a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
106a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
106a6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
106a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
106a8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
106b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces
106b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
106b3('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
106b4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
106b5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
106b6('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
106b7('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
106b8('bum): gang de la tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
107a1('bum): sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
107a2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
107a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
107a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
107a5('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
107a6('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
107a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
107a8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
107b1('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
107b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
107b3('bum): gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
107b4('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
107b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
107b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
107b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
107b8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
108a1('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
108a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
108a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
108a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
108a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
108a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
108a7('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
108a8('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
108b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
108b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
108b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
108b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
108b5('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
108b6('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
108b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
108b8('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
109a1('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
109a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
109a3('bum): mig mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba mi
109a4('bum): rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna mi rtag
109a5('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de
109a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
109a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
109a8('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
109b1('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
109b2('bum): sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
109b3('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
109b4('bum): su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
109b5('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
109b6('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
109b7('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
109b8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
110a1('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi

110b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
