110b7('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
110b8('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
111a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
111a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
111a3('bum): gang de la myig mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
111a4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
111a5('bum): sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
111a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
111a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
111a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
111b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig smon pa
111b2('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
111b3('bum): gang de la rna ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
111b4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
111b5('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
111b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
111b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
111b8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
112a1('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du
112a2('bum): bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
112a3('bum): gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
112a4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
112a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
112a6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
112a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
112a8('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
112b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa

112b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
112b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar/ yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
112b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs myi
112b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sgra myi

113a1('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /

113a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dri sdug
113a8('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /

113b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sgra bdag myed ces bya bar de myi

113b7('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
113b8('bum): gang de la ro bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
114a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la reg bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
114a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jugs pa'o/ /gang de la chos bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
114a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
114a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya

114b3('bum): gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

114b6('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ro stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
114b7('bum): gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
114b8('bum): gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /

115a4('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ro mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
115a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la reg mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

115a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
115a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

115b6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/

116a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

116a3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
116a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
116a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
116a6('bum): gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
116a7('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
116a8('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
116b1('bum): gang de la ro dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
116b2('bum): gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
116b3('bum): gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
116b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
116b5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
116b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
116b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs
116b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par
117a1('bum): shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
117a2('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
117a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
117a4('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna
117a5('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
117a6('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
117a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
117a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
117b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
117b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
117b3('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
117b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
117b5('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
117b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
117b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
117b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
118a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// //
118a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar
118a3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes
118a4('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la

118a6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
118a7('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
118a8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
118b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes
118b2('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
118b3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /

118b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
118b7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
118b8('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam
119a1('bum): par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
119a2('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
119a3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
119a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
119a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed
119a6('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
119a7('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
119a8('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
119b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam
119b2('bum): par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
119b3('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
119b4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam
119b5('bum): par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
119b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
119b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
119b8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
120a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
120a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
120a3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
120a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa
120a5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
120a6('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
120a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
120a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
120b1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
120b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
120b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
120b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi
120b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus
120b6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
120b7('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
120b8('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
121a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
121a2('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
121a3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
121a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
121a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
121a6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te
121a7('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
121a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
121b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
121b2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
121b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i
121b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
121b5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
121b6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
121b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi
121b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
122a1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
122a2('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
122a3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
122a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
122a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med
122a6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
122a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
122a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

122b6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122b7('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
122b8('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

123a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
123a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

123b1('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor

123b7('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
123b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing /

125a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
