125a5('bum): te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
125a6('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
125a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg
125a8('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
125b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
125b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces
125b3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
125b4('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
125b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya
125b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
125b7('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
125b8('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de
126a1('bum): la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
126a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
126a3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i
126a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
126a5('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
126a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug
126a7('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
126a8('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
126b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
126b2('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
126b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar
126b4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
126b5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
126b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
126b7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
126b8('bum): ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
127a1('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
127a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
127a3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi
127a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
127a5('bum): ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te
127a6('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
127a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
127a8('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
127b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
127b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi
127b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
127b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
127b5('bum): tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus
127b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
127b7('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
127b8('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
128a1('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
128a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces
128a3('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
128a4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
128a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
128a6('bum): la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
128a7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
128a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs
128b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
128b2('bum): ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
128b3('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te
128b4('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
128b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
128b6('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
128b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
128b8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par
129a1('bum): 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
129a2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
129a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
129a4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya
129a5('bum): ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
129a6('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
129a7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
129a8('bum): ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang
129b1('bum): de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
129b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
129b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la lus kyis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
129b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la yid
129b5('bum): kyis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
129b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/
129b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
129b8('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug bsngal
130a1('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
130a2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
130a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
130a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
130a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten
130a6('bum): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
130a7('bum): rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
130a8('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
130b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brten cing 'brel bar
130b2('bum): 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
130b3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
130b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag
130b5('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
130b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
130b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
130b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyi
131a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes
131a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
131a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi
131a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
131a5('bum): gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
131a6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
131a7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
131a8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
131b1('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
131b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
131b3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
131b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
131b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
131b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
131b7('bum): phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
131b8('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
132a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
132a2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar
132a3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor
132a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
132a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
132a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de
132a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
132a8('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
132b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
132b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
132b3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
132b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
132b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
132b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol
132b7('bum): tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar
132b8('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus gyis pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
133a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
133a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes
133a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
133a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya
133a5('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
133a6('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
133a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
133a8('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus gyis pha rol tu phyin pa
133b1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ /nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su
133b2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
133b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis
133b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor
133b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
133b6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin
133b7('bum): pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
133b8('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
134a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa myed ces bya bar
134a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
134a3('bum): gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
134a4('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
134a5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
134a6('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
134a7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
134a8('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
134b1('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
134b2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
134b3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du
134b4('bum): bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
134b5('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
134b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
134b7('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
134b8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
135a1('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
135a2('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs
135a3('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
135a4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
135a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar
135a6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
135a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
135a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
135b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs
135b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid
135b3('bum): stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
135b4('bum): bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
135b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
135b6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
135b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
135b8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
136a1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
136a2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
136a3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
136a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
136a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
136a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang
136a7('bum): gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
136a8('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa
136b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
136b2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
136b3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i
136b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
136b5('bum): yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
136b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong
136b7('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
136b8('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
137a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
137a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
137a3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
137a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug
137a5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /
137a6('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
137a7('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
137a8('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
137b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
137b2('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
137b3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
137b4('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
137b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
137b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la myi dmyigs
137b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
137b8('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
138a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
138a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
138a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
138a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
138a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

141b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi
141b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gis
141b8('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
142a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
142a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
142a3('bum): cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
142a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
142a5('bum): nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /
142a6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams
142a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
142a8('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

142b4('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
142b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs

142b7('bum): rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i

146b8('bum): pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
147a1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
147a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
147a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
147a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
147a5('bum): nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug
147a6('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
147a7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
147a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
147b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
147b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid
147b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi
147b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
147b5('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
147b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
147b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
147b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
148a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

148a3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed ces

148a6('bum): yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan

152a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
152a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma
152a5('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug
152a6('bum): pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
152a7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
152a8('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de
152b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag
152b2('bum): rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
152b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
152b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
152b5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
152b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar
152b7('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la
152b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
153a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
153a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
153a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan
153a4('bum): lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
153a5('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
153a6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
153a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
153a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
153b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
153b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
153b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa
153b4('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de
153b5('bum): la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
153b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

155a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i

155a6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
155a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /gang de la tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
