221b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
221b4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
221b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
221b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
221b7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
221b8('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ rang bzhin
222a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
222a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
222a3('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
222a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
222a5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa
222a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te
222a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
222a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
222b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
222b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
222b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/
222b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams nang stong
222b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
222b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
222b7('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
222b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
223a1('bum): bya ba med par/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
223a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po
223a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
223a4('bum): sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus byas
223a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i
223a7('bum): khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
223a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
223b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
223b2('bum): sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
223b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dor ba med pa
223b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams
223b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
223b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
223b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
223b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab tu kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
224a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
224a2('bum): kyang myi dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams
224a3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
224a5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams
224a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
224a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes
224a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
224b1('bum): bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
224b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
224b3('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

224b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
224b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams don dam stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
224b7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
224b8('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

225a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

225b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams

225b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
225b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
225b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

226a3('bum): par/ mye'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

226a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
226a8('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

226b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
226b7('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
226b8('bum): gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
227a1('bum): myed par/ mye'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
227a3('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
227a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
227a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
227a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
227a7('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams
227a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
227b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mye'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
227b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
227b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
227b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
227b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi
227b6('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
227b7('bum): thams mkhyen pa'i nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
227b8('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
228a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
228a2('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
228a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
228a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong
228a5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
228a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
228a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya
228a8('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
228b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
228b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
228b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
228b4('bum): rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
228b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
228b6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya
228b7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
228b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
229a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
229a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
229a3('bum): par/ rlung gi khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
229a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i
229a5('bum): khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
229a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
229a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong
229a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
229b1('bum): rnam pa thams mkhyen pa'i nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
229b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
229b3('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
229b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
229b5('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
229b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
229b7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
229b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
230a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
230a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
230a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
230a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
230a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam
230a6('bum): mkha'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
230a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
230a8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs
230b1('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
230b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
230b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
230b4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po myed pa'i
230b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b6('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
230b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
230b8('bum): ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
231a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
231a2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
231a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
231a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
231a5('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
231a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam
231a7('bum): par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
231a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
231b1('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
231b2('bum): myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
231b3('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
231b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
231b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
231b6('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
231b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/
231b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
232a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
232a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
232a3('bum): bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
232a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
232a5('bum): tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
232a6('bum): myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
232a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
232a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha
232b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/
232b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
232b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig
232b4('bum): pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
232b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
232b6('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
232b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa
232b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
233a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
233a2('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
233a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa mtha' las
233a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
233a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
233a6('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
233a7('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig
233a8('bum): pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
233b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
233b2('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
233b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa
233b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
233b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
233b6('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
233b7('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa
233b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
234a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
234a2('bum): gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi stong
234a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
234a4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

238a2('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa
238a3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
238a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
238a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
238a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying
238a7('bum): dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

243a1('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
243a2('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba
243a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
243a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
243a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
243a6('bum): sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
243a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
243a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/

248a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
248a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
248a3('bum): skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
248a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
248a5('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
248a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
248a7('bum): bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
248a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
248b1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
248b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
248b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
248b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
248b5('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
248b6('bum): skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
248b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
248b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
249a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

249a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

249a7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid

250a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

250b7('bum): la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
250b8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar
251a1('bum): bzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
251a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmyigs la/ yang dag
251a3('bum): par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs
251a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
251a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmyigs la/ dbang po de dag kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
251a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmyigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su
251a7('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi
251a8('bum): yan lag de dag kyang dmyigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
251b1('bum): med par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su
251b2('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
251b3('bum): pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
251b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmyigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
251b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
251b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs myed
251b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
251b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i
252a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
252a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa de dag
252a4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
252a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
252a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmyigs la/ ting nge 'dzin
252a7('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
252a8('bum): gyis gzungs kyis sgo de dag kyang dmyigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
252b1('bum): med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
252b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myi 'jig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jig pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/
252b3('bum): mi 'jig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
252b4('bum): sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
252b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmyigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
252b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas
252b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
252b8('bum): bam po bco brgyad pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs myi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
253a1('bum): 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab
253a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
253a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par
253a4('bum): byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /
253a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas
253a6('bum): gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'dis ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i myi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par myi bya'o/ /gzung
253a7('bum): bar myi bya'o/ /bcang bar myi bya'o/ /klag par myi bya'o/ /kun chub par myi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par myi bya'o zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
253a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can/ sangs rgyas kyi cha
253b1('bum): byad du byas pa dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/
253b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims
253b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las myi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa myi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor
253b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
253b5('bum): po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /
253b6('bum): chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to/ /zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag myi smra
253b7('bum): myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253b8('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems chung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir myi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
254a1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang myi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rigs par
254a2('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis
254a3('bum): stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du shes ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myig ni bdag
254a4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid ni bdag gam bdag
254a5('bum): gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
254a6('bum): chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
254a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag
254a8('bum): gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
254b1('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag
254b2('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
254b3('bum): tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chu'i khams ni bdag gam
254b4('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / /me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam
254b5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mying dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
254b6('bum): skye mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
254b7('bum): srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
254b8('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag
255a1('bum): gis stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
255a2('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni
255a3('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis
255a4('bum): stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni
255a5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dngos
255a6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
255a7('bum): rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
255a8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshad med pa rnams ni
255b1('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
255b2('bum): pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
255b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag
255b4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam gis stong ngo / /snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
255b5('bum): de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
255b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rigs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/
255b7('bum): shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang myed do/ /nyan thos
255b8('bum): shes bya ba yang med do/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang /
256a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med / nyan thos zhes bya ba
256a2('bum): yang med do/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos
256a3('bum): kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
256a4('bum): bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag
256a5('bum): mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
256a6('bum): yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs
256a7('bum): rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang /
256a8('bum): tshad med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
256b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su sgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
256b2('bum): byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
256b3('bum): sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
256b4('bum): pas/ khyod la ci zhig bya de'i don tu ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med par 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad myed pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod
256b5('bum): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod la de la brtson par gyis shig /ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud
256b6('bum): gyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rigs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /
256b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
256b8('bum): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar
257a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon
257a2('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang /
257a3('bum): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i
257a4('bum): tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
257a5('bum): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
257a6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / myig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
257a7('bum): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
257a8('bum): rna ba myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang /
257b1('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
257b2('bum): bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lce myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
257b3('bum): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
257b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
257b5('bum): zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
257b6('bum): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
257b7('bum): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
257b8('bum): ston pa dang / sgra mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
258a1('bum): 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dri mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
258a2('bum): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / ro myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
258a3('bum): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs
258a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / reg myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
258a5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / chos myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
