268a1('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
268a2('bum): skyes bu don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus ma byas
268a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu thog ma dang tha ma myed
268a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid
268a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i
268a6('bum): tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /
268a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
268a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don
268b1('bum): myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /
268b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor
268b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi
268b4('bum): don myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
268b5('bum): bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
268b6('bum): ma'i skyes bu tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor
268b7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i
268b8('bum): tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon
269a1('bum): par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
269a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
269a3('bum): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu
269a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu snying rje chen po
269a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
269a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
269a7('bum): gzugs la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
269a8('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
269b1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
269b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
269b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed de myed pa'i
269b4('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
269b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
269b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
269b7('bum): rgyas kyi myig la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
269b8('bum): tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
270a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
270a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
270a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce de myed pa'i phyir
270a4('bum): te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
270a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
270a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i
270a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ yid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
270a8('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
270b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra la gnas myed do/ /
270b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
270b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dri la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
270b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ro la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab
270b5('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
270b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi reg la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
270b7('bum): gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
270b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
271a1('bum): rgyas kyi myig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
271a2('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par
271a3('bum): shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
271a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271a5('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i rnam par shes
271a6('bum): pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
271a7('bum): myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
271a8('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
271b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
271b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i
271b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
271b4('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
271b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
271b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
271b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
271b8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
272a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
272a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
272a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
272a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i
272a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
272a6('bum): tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i
272a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor
272a8('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de
272b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
272b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
272b3('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi 'dus
272b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
272b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /
272b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
272b7('bum): gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
272b8('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
273a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chu'i khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
273a2('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mye'i khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mye'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
273a3('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
273a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rlung gi khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
273a5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha'i khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i
273a6('bum): khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
273a7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
273b1('bum): ma rig pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs
273b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
273b3('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes
273b4('bum): pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
273b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mying dang gzugs la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mying dang gzugs de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
273b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skye mched drug la gnas myed do/ /
273b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /
273b8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi reg pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
274a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
274a2('bum): rgyas kyi tshor ba la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /

277a4('bum): myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
277a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
277a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang po rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
277a7('bum): dbang po de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
277a8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
277b1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan
277b2('bum): lag de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
277b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
277b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags
277b5('bum): pa'i bden pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
277b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
277b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshad myed pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /
277b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor
278a1('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
278a2('bum): pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
278a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
278a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
278a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
278a6('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
278a7('bum): smon pa myed pa la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
278a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas med do/ /
278b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di
278b2('bum): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
278b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
278b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
278b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas myed do/ /
278b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /
278b7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
278b8('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
279a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
279a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
279a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi snying rje chen po la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
279a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
279a5('bum): brgyad la gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
279a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ / //
